name: Harem Days
nutshell:
Harem Days
Madoka Mitsuru (Enman to his coworkers) is a rough ex-yankee, so he's not really sure how he got a job at a prestigious company. He works in "the harem", the name of the gofer department because of all the attractive ladies, under Chief Suzunari, a cheery middle-aged man who doesn't understand the meaning of personal space!


Hareta Yoru no Hikari
Medical intern Chikada Tomoharu is always being called a "nice guy", especially when he's being dumped. When his lover dumps him by email, text message, and he's roughed up by the yakuza outside his apartment building he's having the worst day ever. Building caretaker Fukiage Tatsuru scares the gang off, and he and Chikada become friends. But does Tatsuru only see him as a "nice guy" too?


Itsuka no Himitsu
It's been ten years since Yuuya was home. That was the last time he faced Asato, the blind neighbor he's always had a crush on. He's spent the time trying to forget the one night he acted on those feelings. But he's been fired and evicted; with no place to go he returns to his childhood home and the man he's never forgotten.


My Secret: Itsuka no Himitsu bonus

name: The Subway Dog
nutshell: Shinoda is still reeling from the sudden separation from his wife when one evening he's lured into a peculiar little shop by the smell of coffee. There, Asukura, the shop's proprietor, converses with him about the beauty and usefulness of broken things. Despite himself, Shinoda keeps coming back for coffee… and conversation.

name: A Close Call Romance
nutshell:
An obscure actress named Kim Eun-hong, who alternates between minor roles and extras.
On her way home drunk after being dumped by her boyfriend of nine years, Kim Eun-Hong became involved in an accident with Lee Kang-il, the CEO of LJ Pharmaceutical.
But then Kang-il suddenly asks me to act like his fiancée. You’re giving me a billion won just for getting engaged? Why me?
“I can’t live without Kim Eun-hong.”
I’m pretending to be his fake fiancée to avoid being thrown into jail…
Can Eun-hong be reborn as a veiled French girl with a gold spoon? And will she be able to keep her contract with Kang-il, who harbors a lot of secrets?
A man who dies if he’s not confident?! And Eun-hong’s life-threatening (?) romance act for him!

name: EX-ARM EXA
nutshell: Matsuri Amamori, a newbie policewoman, is just doing her daily job when she suddenly encounters the renowned terrorist who destroyed Tokyo, ||Akira Natsume||

name: Hana Furu Futari
nutshell:
Official English by Renta! (February 2022)
Minakami is a successful man tormented by his past.  When he meets Kakuta, an upright colleague with a strong sense of justice, he uses his secret to lure Kakuta into his embrace.  But Fate turns the past that haunts him into a catalyst that brings them closer together.

name: High School Girl X Dragon
nutshell: A light-hearted slice of life about a high school girl and her new friend, a dragon.

name: Love Disasters of a Meddlesome Girl
nutshell: A meddlesome girl, Setsuko, tries to speed along the painfully slow progress of the relationship between her two childhood friends, Yusuke and Saori. Problem is, they like someone else… A LOT!!!

name: A Sword's Evolution Begins From Killing
nutshell: Ye Fan was reborn as a strange sword with its own upgrade system. Ye Fan has been continuously upgraded through the killing experience of the sword masters of the past dynasties, and has become an evil sword that everyone in another world competes for. As soon as the evil sword was born, it would definitely set off a bloody storm, and Ye Fan also worked hard to get rid of the sword body and restore his human form as soon as possible…

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - Levi and Mikasa
nutshell:
Pairing: Levi x Mikasa
Цикл історій про стосунки капітана Лівая та Мікаси від ebgr (pixiv ID 574765).

name: Pansy of Light
nutshell: A zoologist, Mark, brought a child from Africa, a wild child who was raised by chimpanzees in the jungle and could say neither words nor her own name. Named Pansy, she is lovingly raised by Mark and his fiancée, Marlin, and gradually grows up to be a human girl as she spends time with Ed, a mysterious boy she meets in the garden. She promised Ed that she would be the best lady she could be, but she soon runs away from the school she entered... However, the old Earl of Hertford she meets on her escape is actually....

name: Death to the White Ferret!
nutshell:
"I waited a thousand years. As a weasel."
Leonie, the princess that destroyed a country, is given eternal punishment. Not as a human... but as a weasel! One day, after a thousand years of hiding in the forest, a boy who understands the words of a weasel appears! He even confessed to it being his first love! But Leonie, whose love cells had dried up...
"After a thousand years, I can finally die!"
I only intend to use this innocent boy! Chanjae, a hopeless devotee who fell in love with princess Leonie, a mage who became a weasel, as well as a figure he longed to meet from a history book he had read.

name: Sayonara, Nanashi no Violin
nutshell: In a world where objects with names become living creatures, a 2nd year college student named Sosuke breaks his violin. As a replacement, he ends up purchasing a 'named' violin that can transform into a human. The violin falls in love with Sosuke's playing, but no matter how much they practice, they can't get a decent sound! They'll have to figure out a solution to their problem...

name: I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!
nutshell:
Amano, who returned to the city where he lived as a child for the first time in 10 years, meet Yukio Sawatari, a childhood friend on the first day of transfer, when he (a male friend) turned female! Although she shares her joy, as she suddenly turns into a girl and cannot hide her embarrassment. Yukio was affected by an illness like 100,000 other people, suddenly becoming a girl so-called " spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis ''!
The female childhood friend ♂ is cute and in trouble!? Forbidden TSF (transsexual) Love!

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha - Kodomo ja Nai Mon (Doujinshi)
nutshell: This is a 36 pages long comedy centered doujinshi about Fate going on a mission, something going wrong, and thus being forced to return to her home with an adorable child version of herself.

name: Shinonome Tantei Ibun Roku
nutshell: A detective who's investigating an onsen town that has seen better days encounters a mysterious exotic dancer.

name: Full Contact
nutshell: When Otawa Ryuuichi is dumped by a girl because she only likes strong people, he gets really depressed. While watching karate on tv he thinks "I want to be strong too!". The same day he is forced to join a karate dojo.

name: Koroshiya Akazukin
nutshell: Red Hooded Assassin Red Wolf sets out to kill grandma.

name: The Hollow Regalia
nutshell: In an already-destructed Japan, Yahoro spent his day working as "the collector". He had finished up his work as the collector today as well when he ran into the so-called "monsters". He got had his internal organs jacked up and "safely" arrived at his bed.

name: Two First Class Stars
nutshell: What would you do if you are fated with two people?

name: Final Fantasy XII - Sky Regrus  (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Balthier and Fran's first meeting.

name: Deathdeus: Hero of the Dead
nutshell:
An exciting new manga from Mori Kotaro, the artist for the manga adaptation of the famed Gurren Lagann! Humanity is plagued by the undead Reversed, and no one can stand against them. No one except… a high school girl named Shion-chan from another time? She'll resurrect this rotten world with her maiden fists! (Source: Mangamo)
||**dahulu seluruh dunia hidup dengan damai
namun semuanya berubah
saat bom nuklir dijatuhkan.
Hanya JK yang mampu mengendalikan
elemen cahaya yang dapat
menghentikannya.
Namun saat dunia membutuhkannya
dia menghilang
Seratus tahun kemudian
aku dan senpaiku menemukan
seorang JK muda yang baru
Seorang pengendali cahaya bernama Shion
Walaupun ilmu pengedalian
cahayanya sangat bagus,
namun dia masih butuh banyak waktu
untuk bisa menguasai semuanya,
Tapi aku yakin,
Shion dapat menyelamatkan dunia**||

name: Blazing Ninjaman
nutshell: Since the beginning of time ninjas have been regarded as people with great skill and power, the Blazing NinjaMan (Shinobi Mantaro) is one such young man. There is only one problem, the era of the ninja has come and gone. How can Shinobi consider himself a ninja in modern day Japan (1990s) and survive the daily rigors of high school life.

name: L-DK Pink
nutshell:
The sequel of L-DK will start in the upcoming Betsufure issue 03/2022 out February 12, 2022.
The sequel series will follow Aoi and Shusei at 23 years old, and the manga will have an irregular serialization.

name: Choose Your Real Daddy Tyrant
nutshell:
Four tyrants. Which one of them is my father?!
After working herself to death, professor Jaehee Cheon is reincarnated as a princess in a fantasy novel. Now, she must find her father from the four candidates before her, or face death — again. Will Jaehee get her happy ending?

name: BanG Dream!- A Secret Story (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A short work about Misaki wanting Kokoro to smile.
A Bandori work.
Read left to right.
Originally posted on: https://twitter.com/kkkckdfhd

name: I Bought the Land, Not a Man
nutshell:
I was envious of the side character who seemed to easily raise money compared to the distressed female lead. And one day, I was looking at inflating land and thought I could get rich if I bought it. Suddenly, a fortune comes with a suspicious voice! Eliana is a countess’ loyal lady-in-waiting and an extra maid. Many have been eyeing the land to make investments as she got wealthy... even a creepy duke started to follow her around!
“Let me do what I want, Eliana.”
“I don’t want to.”
With her own ability, will she be able to keep her land and family safe while getting rich? Follow the female lead in this messy, romantic, comedy story!

She envies the life of an extra in the novel who earns money easily. One day, she possessed an extra character who is the loyal maid of the heroine in a novel. All she needs to do now is to become a rich man in the land! But... can she protect it from the cunning duke who covets her abilities?

name: Ebisu Gakuen Chuutouka Nichiyou Hoshuugumi Tanteidan
nutshell:
A long-awaited comic series which is a collaboration with the rising stars "EBiDAN39"! A teenage prodigy… and also a dropout?!
Follow the school life adventures of 6 unique and unconventional students! Due to his excessive absences, Riku Rokuoin, who is a genius with an IQ of 270 ,ends up needing to go to a special "Sunday Remedial Class" but the students he met there were ones of his kind!

name: From today forth, I'm a magical girl??
nutshell: Oneshot of Takeya, becoming a magical girl, Takeko.

name: Don't Mess With Me, Miss
nutshell: Due to the betrayal of his close friend and girlfriend, college student Wang Ming sunk into the lowest point in his life. During the time he was at his lowest, he had many conflicts out of anger and a will to strike back with the campus belle who he was co-renting with. However, it was also at this time when he was accidentally drawn into a series of conspiracies and contacted the hidden witchcraft society behind modern society. After the evolving Gǔ insect 'Gold Silkworm Gǔ' treated him as its host, he became unceasingly stronger and each and every formidable enemy also continued to emerge from the depths….
